```{r}
txtbl <- fread('hg38c_txtable.tsv')
txtbl <- txtbl[chr!='chrM']
keepcodes <- unlist(strsplit("c=kjmno",''))
setnames(txtbl, c('tid', 'name', 'gbkey'), c('ref_id','txid','txtype'))
txtbl[, predicted:=grepl('^X', txid)]

## -- load a set
## loadtmap returns a list (tmap=dt, tnum=txcount)
loadtmap <- function (file=NULL) {
  tmap <- fread(file)
  tnum <- nrow(tmap)
  tmap <- tmap[ref_id!='-' & class_code %in% keepcodes ]
  tmap[txtbl, `:=` (txid=i.txid, txtype=i.txtype, biotype=i.gene_biotype, 
                    gene_name=i.gene_name, predicted=i.predicted), on=.(ref_id) ]
  tmap <- tmap[!is.na(txid)]
  #'misc_RNA' is how GenBank labels 'ncRNA' transcripts from a 'protein_coding' gene
  stopifnot(all.equal(tmap[txtype=='misc_RNA'], 
                       tmap[grepl('^[NX]R_', txid) & biotype=='protein_coding'])==T)
  tmap[txtype=='misc_RNA', txtype:='ncRNA']
  ## contingency table: predicted x coding for matching 
  tmm <- unique(tmap[class_code=='=', .(txid, predicted, txtype)])
  tpred <- as.data.table(table(tmm$predicted))
  colnames(tpred) <- c('predicted', 'count')
  tcod <- as.data.table(table(tmm$txtype))
  colnames(tcod) <- c('coding', 'count')
  tcod[, coding:=(coding=='mRNA')]
                         
  list(tmap=tmap, tnum=tnum, tcod=tcod, tpred=tpred)
}

drawVenn <- function(s3, names=NULL, title=NULL) {
  if (!is.null(names)) names(s3) <- names
  #myCol <- c("#ABB5E890", "#E8ABB590", "#E280E290")
  myCol <- c("#4048E880", "#F84B4580", "#b240c280")
  #myEdgeCol <- c("#ABB5E8ff", "#E8ABB5ff", "#E280E2ff")
  myEdgeCol <- c("#a0a8ff", "#f88484", "#b2a0d2")
  mylcol <- c("#4048E8", "#E84B45ff", "#b040B0ff")
  vd <- venn.diagram(x=s3,
         #category.names = c("Long", "Short", "Hybrid"),
         #filename = "venn1_tm.png",
         filename = NULL,
         output=T,
         height = 2.3, 
         width = 2.3, 
         units = "in",
         dpi = 72,
         compression = "lzw",
         # Circles
        fill = myCol, lwd=1, lty='solid', col=myEdgeCol, #lwd = 2, lty = 'blank', 
         # Numbers
        cex = 0.75, fontface = "bold", fontfamily = "sans",
        # Set names
        cat.cex = 0.82, cat.fontface = "bold",
        cat.col = mylcol,
        cat.default.pos = "outer",
        cat.pos = c(-37, 37, 128),
        cat.dist = c(0.098, 0.098, 0.1),
        cat.fontfamily = "sans",
        rotation = 1,
        margin = 0.12
  )
  gt <-  gTree(children=vd)
  #gtcod <- addGrob(gtcod, linesGrob(x=c(0.01, 0.99, 0.99, 0.01, 0.01),
  #         y=c(0.01, 0.01, 0.99, 0.99, 0.01),
  #         gp=gpar(lwd=0.1)) )
  if (!is.null(title)) 
    return(arrangeGrob(grobs=list(gt,grid.text(title, y=1.6, gp=gpar(col="black", cex=0.9)) ), 
                       nrow=2, ncol=1, heights=c(18,1)))
  return(gt)
}

```

#must be in this order: short, long, mix
files <- c('SRR16071313_short.tmap', 'SRR16071311_long.tmap', 'SRR16071313_SRR16071311_mix.tmap')
genbarPlots <- function(files=NULL, startLetter='A') {
  sd <- loadtmap(files[1])
  ld <- loadtmap(files[2])
  md <- loadtmap(files[3])
  stm <- sd$tmap[class_code=='=']
  ltm <- ld$tmap[class_code=='=']
  mtm <- md$tmap[class_code=='=']
  
  mtpred=unique(mtm[predicted==T]$txid)
  stpred=unique(stm[predicted==T]$txid)
  ltpred=unique(ltm[predicted==T]$txid)
  mtcod=unique(mtm[txtype=='mRNA']$txid)
  stcod=unique(stm[txtype=='mRNA']$txid)
  ltcod=unique(ltm[txtype=='mRNA']$txid)
  mtnc=unique(mtm[txtype!='mRNA']$txid)
  stnc=unique(stm[txtype!='mRNA']$txid)
  ltnc=unique(ltm[txtype!='mRNA']$txid)

  #library(RColorBrewer)
  #myCol <- brewer.pal(3, "Pastel2")
  #rm(overrideTriple)
  snames=c("Long", "Short", "Hybrid")
  #s3 <- list(unique(ltm$txid), unique(stm$txid), unique(mtm$txid))
  #vall <- drawVenn(s3, snames)

  s3 <- list(ltcod, stcod, mtcod)
  vcod <- drawVenn(s3, snames, "coding")
  
  s3 <- list(ltnc, stnc, mtnc)
  vncod <- drawVenn(s3, snames, "non-coding")

  s3 <- list(ltpred, stpred, mtpred)
  vpred <- drawVenn(s3, snames, "predicted")
  ag <- arrangeGrob(grobs=list(vcod, vncod, vpred), nrow=1, ncol=3)
  #grid.draw(ag) 
  ggsave(ag, file="my_plot0.svg", width=6.6, height=2, device="svg")
  
 #stop("stop here for now")  
  dpred <- rbindlist(list(sd$tpred[, assembly:='Short'], ld$tpred[, assembly:='Long'], md$tpred[, assembly:='Hybrid']))
  dpred$assembly <- factor(dpred$assembly, levels=c('Long','Short', 'Hybrid'))
  dpred[, cvar:=paste0(substr(assembly, start=1, stop=1), ifelse(predicted, 'T', 'F')) ]
  dpred[order(count), yp:=cumsum(count), by=assembly] #[predicted==F, yp:=yp-600]

  dcod <- rbindlist(list(sd$tcod[, assembly:='Short'], ld$tcod[, assembly:='Long'], md$tcod[, assembly:='Hybrid']))
  dcod$assembly <- factor(dcod$assembly, levels=c('Long', 'Short', 'Hybrid'))
  dcod[, cvar:=paste0(substr(assembly, start=1, stop=1), ifelse(coding, 'F', 'T')) ]
  dcod[order(count), yp:=cumsum(count), by=assembly]
  
  #ylim=c(0, 28000)
  
  dmcod <-  copy(dcod)
  setnames(dmcod, 'coding', 'status')
  dmcod$type <- 'non-coding'
  dmpred <-  copy(dpred)
  setnames(dmpred, 'predicted', 'status')
  dmpred$type <- 'predicted'
  dmall <- rbindlist(list(dmcod, dmpred))
  dmall[type=='non-coding' & status==F, cvar:='nc']
  dmall[type=='predicted' & status==T, cvar:='pred']
  dmall$cvar <- factor(dmall$cvar, levels=c('LF', 'SF', 'HF', 'nc', 'pred' ))
  dmall$hj <- 0.5
  dmall$yl <- dmall$yp
  dmall[ type=='predicted' & ! cvar %in% c('nc','pred'), yl:=0]
  dmall[ type=='non-coding' & ! cvar %in% c('nc','pred'), yl:=yl-2000]
  dmall[ type=='non-coding' & ! cvar %in% c('nc','pred'), hj:=-0.34]
    
    
  #colors=c('LF'="#9090ff", 'SF'= "#ff9090", 'HF'="#ff70ff", 'nc'="#b6d864", 'pred'="#f4e24f")
  #colors=c('LF'="#9090ff", 'SF'= "#ff7B75", 'HF'="#ef70ff", 'nc'="#b6d864", 'pred'="#f4e24f")
  colors=c('LF'="#b4bafd", 'SF'= "#ff9b9b", 'HF'="#d9aff0", 'nc'="#b0e8b0", 'pred'="#f0f070")
    #colors=c('SF'= "#e34031", 'LF'="#3758f3", 'HF'="#c062c0", 'nc'="#674a5f", 'pred'="#3a722c")
    #colors=c('SF'= "#e34031", 'LF'="#3758f3", 'HF'="#c062c0", 'nc'="#5a5a5a", 'pred'="#5a924c")
    
  #gcod <- 
    #ggplot(dcod, aes(fill=cvar, y=count, x=assembly)) +
 gg <-     
    ggplot(dmall[order(yp)], aes(fill=cvar, y=count, x=type)) +
    geom_bar(position="stack", stat="identity", width = 1) + # ggtitle("protein coding status")+
    scale_fill_manual(values=colors, labels = c("Long", "Short", "Hybrid", "non-coding", "predicted")) +
    facet_grid(~ assembly) +
    geom_label(data=subset(dmall, yl>0), aes(label=yp, y=yl, fill=cvar,  hjust=hj), 
               label.size=NA, vjust=0.4, color="black", size=3.2, show.legend = F)+
      scale_color_manual(guide="none")+
    #coord_cartesian(ylim = ylim) +
    scale_y_continuous(expand = expansion(add=c(0,0)), breaks=seq(0, 20000, 5000)) +
    theme_bw() + xlab(NULL) + ylab('NULL'transcript') +
    theme( panel.border = element_blank(), 
          axis.line = element_line(colour = "gray80"),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), legend.title = element_blank(),
          strip.background = element_rect(color="white", fill="white", size=1.5)
     )
 ## output should be 596x188 px, i.e. 8.27 x 2.61 in
 #gg    
 #ggsave(gg, file="my_plot_chart.svg", width=6.6, height=2.2, device="svg")
 l=as.numeric(charToRaw(startLetter))+1
 vlabels=c(rawToChar(as.raw(l)), rawToChar(as.raw(l+1)), rawToChar(as.raw(l+2)))
 vnds <- ggarrange(vcod, vncod, vpred, labels=vlabels, vjust=1.4, ncol=3, nrow=1)
 if (startLetter=='A') 
    return(ggarrange(gg, vnds, labels=startLetter, vjust=1.4, ncol=1, nrow=2, widths=c(1,0.5)))

 #ggall <- 
 ggarrange(linesGrob(x=c(0.01, 0.99), y=c(0.99, 0.99), gp=gpar(col="gray60", lwd=0.4)),

 #ggsave(ggall, file="0_ggarr.svg", width=6.6, height=4.2, device="svg")
 
}
